00091 void BeginAutoBandage( )
00092 {
00093       INT32                               cnt;
00094       BOOLEAN                             fFoundAGuy = FALSE;
00095       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
00096       BOOLEAN                             fFoundAMedKit = FALSE;
00097 
00098 
00099       // If we are in combat, we con't...
00100       if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) || (NumEnemyInSector() != 0) )
00101       {
00102             DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, Message[ STR_SECTOR_NOT_CLEARED ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, NULL );
00103             return;
00104       }
00105 
00106       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00107       // check for anyone needing bandages
00108       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++ )
00109       {
00110             // if the soldier isn't active or in sector, we have problems..leave
00111             if ( !(pSoldier->bActive) || !(pSoldier->bInSector) || ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) || (pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) )
00112             {
00113                   continue;
00114             }
00115 
00116             // can this character be helped out by a teammate?
00117             if ( CanCharacterBeAutoBandagedByTeammate( pSoldier ) == TRUE )
00118             {
00119                   fFoundAGuy = TRUE;
00120                   if ( fFoundAGuy && fFoundAMedKit )
00121                   {
00122                         break;
00123                   }
00124             }
00125             if ( FindObjClass( pSoldier, IC_MEDKIT ) != NO_SLOT )
00126             {
00127                   fFoundAMedKit = TRUE;
00128                   if ( fFoundAGuy && fFoundAMedKit )
00129                   {
00130                         break;
00131                   }     
00132             }
00133       
00134       }
00135 
00136       if ( !fFoundAGuy )
00137       {
00138             DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, TacticalStr[ AUTOBANDAGE_NOT_NEEDED ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, NULL );
00139       }
00140       else if ( !fFoundAMedKit )
00141       {
00142             DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, gzLateLocalizedString[ 9 ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, NULL );
00143       }
00144       else
00145       {
00146             if ( ! CanAutoBandage( FALSE ) )
00147             {
00148                   DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, TacticalStr[ CANT_AUTOBANDAGE_PROMPT ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL, NULL );
00149             }     
00150             else
00151             {
00152                   // Confirm if we want to start or not....
00153                   DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, TacticalStr[ BEGIN_AUTOBANDAGE_PROMPT_STR ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, BeginAutoBandageCallBack, NULL );
00154             }
00155       }
00156 }

00159 void HandleAutoBandagePending( )
00160 {
00161       INT32 cnt;
00162       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
00163 
00164       // OK, if we have a pending autobandage....
00165       // check some conditions
00166       if ( gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandagePending )
00167       {
00168             // All dailogue done, music, etc...
00169             //if ( gubMusicMode != MUSIC_TACTICAL_VICTORY && DialogueQueueIsEmpty( ) )
00170             if ( !DialogueQueueIsEmpty( ) )
00171             {
00172                   return;
00173             }
00174 
00175             // If there is no actively talking guy...
00176             if ( gpCurrentTalkingFace != NULL )
00177             {
00178                   return;
00179             }
00180 
00181             // Do any guys have pending actions...?
00182             cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID;
00183             for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
00184             {
00185                   // Are we in sector?
00186                   if ( pSoldier->bActive  )
00187                   {
00188                         if ( pSoldier->sSectorX == gWorldSectorX && pSoldier->sSectorY == gWorldSectorY && pSoldier->bSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ && !pSoldier->fBetweenSectors )
00189                         {
00190                               if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction != NO_PENDING_ACTION )
00191                               {
00192                                     return;
00193                               }
00194                         }
00195                   }
00196             }
00197       
00198             // Do was have any menus up?
00199             if ( AreWeInAUIMenu( ) )
00200             {
00201                   return;
00202             }
00203 
00204 
00205 
00206             // If here, all's a go!
00207             gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandagePending = FALSE;
00208             BeginAutoBandage( );
00209       }
00210 }

00219 // Should we ask buddy ti auto bandage...?
00220 void ShouldBeginAutoBandage( )
00221 {
00222       // If we are in combat, we con't...
00223       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
00224       {
00225             return;
00226       }
00227 
00228   // ATE: If not in endgame
00229   if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & IN_DEIDRANNA_ENDGAME ) )
00230   {
00231     return;
00232   }
00233 
00234       if ( CanAutoBandage( FALSE ) )
00235       {
00236       // OK, now setup as a pending event...
00237             SetAutoBandagePending( TRUE );
00238       }
00239 }

00241 
00242 BOOLEAN HandleAutoBandage( )
00243 {
00244   InputAtom                         InputEvent;
00245 
00246       if ( gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode )
00247       {
00248             if ( gfBeginningAutoBandage )
00249             {
00250                   //Shadow area
00251                   ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );          
00252                   InvalidateScreen( );
00253                   RefreshScreen( NULL );
00254             }
00255 
00256             DisplayAutoBandageUpdatePanel( );
00257 
00258             //RenderMercPopUpBoxFromIndex( giBoxId, gsX, gsY,  FRAME_BUFFER );
00259 
00260             //InvalidateRegion( gsX, gsY, gsX + gusTextBoxWidth, gsY + gusTextBoxHeight );
00261 
00262             EndFrameBufferRender( );
00263 
00264             // Handle strategic engine
00265             HandleStrategicTurn( );
00266 
00267             HandleTeamServices( OUR_TEAM );
00268 
00269             if ( guiAutoBandageSeconds <= 120 )
00270             {
00271                   guiAutoBandageSeconds += 5;
00272             }
00273 
00274             // Execute Tactical Overhead
00275             ExecuteOverhead( );
00276 
00277             // Deque all game events
00278             DequeAllGameEvents( TRUE );
00279 
00280             while (DequeueEvent(&InputEvent) == TRUE)
00281             {
00282                   if ( InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP )
00283                   {
00284                         if( ( ( InputEvent.usParam == ESC ) && ( fAutoBandageComplete == FALSE ) )|| ( ( ( InputEvent.usParam == ENTER ) || ( InputEvent.usParam == SPACE ) ) && ( fAutoBandageComplete == TRUE ) ) )
00285                         {
00286                               AutoBandage( FALSE );
00287                         }
00288                   }
00289             }
00290 
00291             gfBeginningAutoBandage = FALSE;
00292 
00293             if( fEndAutoBandage )
00294             {
00295                   AutoBandage( FALSE ); 
00296                   fEndAutoBandage = FALSE;
00297             }
00298 
00299             return( TRUE );
00300       }
00301 
00302 
00303 
00304       return( FALSE );
00305 }

00307 
00308 BOOLEAN CreateAutoBandageString( void )
00309 {
00310       INT32                               cnt;
00311       UINT8                               ubDoctor[20], ubDoctors = 0;
00312       UINT32                              uiDoctorNameStringLength = 1; // for end-of-string character
00313       STR16                               sTemp;
00314       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
00315 
00316       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID;
00317       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
00318       {
00319             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && !(pSoldier->bCollapsed) && pSoldier->bMedical > 0 && FindObjClass( pSoldier, IC_MEDKIT ) != NO_SLOT)
00320             {
00321                   ubDoctor[ubDoctors] = pSoldier->ubID;
00322                   ubDoctors++;
00323                   // increase the length of the string by the size of the name
00324                   // plus 2, one for the comma and one for the space after that
00325                   uiDoctorNameStringLength += wcslen( pSoldier->name ) + 2;
00326             }
00327       }
00328       if (ubDoctors == 0)
00329       {
00330             return( FALSE );
00331       }
00332 
00333       if (ubDoctors == 1)
00334       {     
00335             uiDoctorNameStringLength += wcslen( Message[STR_IS_APPLYING_FIRST_AID] );
00336       }
00337       else
00338       {
00339             uiDoctorNameStringLength += wcslen( Message[STR_ARE_APPLYING_FIRST_AID] );
00340       }
00341 
00342       sAutoBandageString = (STR16) MemRealloc( sAutoBandageString, uiDoctorNameStringLength * sizeof( CHAR16 ) );
00343       if (!sAutoBandageString)
00344       {
00345             return( FALSE );
00346       }
00347       
00348       if (ubDoctors == 1)
00349       {     
00350             swprintf( sAutoBandageString, Message[STR_IS_APPLYING_FIRST_AID], MercPtrs[ubDoctor[0]]->name );
00351       }
00352       else
00353       {
00354             // make a temporary string to hold most of the doctors names joined by commas
00355             sTemp = (STR16) MemAlloc( uiDoctorNameStringLength * sizeof( CHAR16 ) );
00356       //    sTemp = MemAlloc( 1000 );
00357             if (!sTemp)
00358             {
00359                   return( FALSE );
00360             }
00361             wcscpy( sTemp, L"" );
00362             for (cnt = 0; cnt < ubDoctors - 1; cnt++)
00363             {
00364                   wcscat( sTemp, MercPtrs[ubDoctor[cnt]]->name );
00365                   if (ubDoctors > 2)
00366                   {
00367                         if (cnt == ubDoctors - 2)
00368                         {
00369                               wcscat( sTemp, L"," );
00370                         }
00371                         else
00372                         {
00373                               wcscat( sTemp, L", " );
00374                         }
00375                   }
00376             }
00377             swprintf( sAutoBandageString, Message[STR_ARE_APPLYING_FIRST_AID], sTemp, MercPtrs[ubDoctor[ubDoctors - 1]]->name );
00378             MemFree( sTemp );
00379       }
00380       return( TRUE );
00381 }

00388       return;

00391 void AutoBandage( BOOLEAN fStart )
00392 {
00393       SGPRect                             aRect;
00394       UINT8                               ubLoop;
00395       INT32                               cnt;
00396       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
00397 
00398       if ( fStart )
00399       {
00400             gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode     = TRUE;
00401             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags                               |= OUR_MERCS_AUTO_MOVE;
00402 
00403             gfAutoBandageFailed = FALSE;
00404             
00405 
00406             // ste up the autobandage panel
00407             SetUpAutoBandageUpdatePanel( );
00408 
00409             // Lock UI!
00410             //guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_BEGINUILOCK;
00411             HandleTacticalUI( );
00412 
00413             PauseGame();
00414             // Compress time...
00415             //SetGameTimeCompressionLevel( TIME_COMPRESS_5MINS );
00416 
00417             cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID;
00418             for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
00419             {
00420                   if ( pSoldier->bActive  )
00421                   {
00422                         pSoldier->bSlotItemTakenFrom = NO_SLOT;
00423                         pSoldier->ubAutoBandagingMedic = NOBODY;
00424                   }
00425             }
00426 
00427             ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_RED, MSG_DEBUG, L"Begin auto bandage." );           
00428 
00429             if (CreateAutoBandageString())
00430             {
00431                   giBoxId = PrepareMercPopupBox( -1, DIALOG_MERC_POPUP_BACKGROUND, DIALOG_MERC_POPUP_BORDER, sAutoBandageString, 200, 40, 10, 30, &gusTextBoxWidth, &gusTextBoxHeight );
00432             }
00433 
00434             // WANNE 2
00435             aRect.iTop        =     0;
00436             aRect.iLeft       =     0;
00437             aRect.iBottom =   INV_INTERFACE_START_Y;
00438             aRect.iRight      =     SCREEN_WIDTH;
00439 
00440             // Determine position ( centered in rect )
00441             gsX = (INT16)( ( ( ( aRect.iRight   - aRect.iLeft ) - gusTextBoxWidth ) / 2 ) + aRect.iLeft );
00442             gsY = (INT16)( ( ( ( aRect.iBottom - aRect.iTop ) - gusTextBoxHeight ) / 2 ) + aRect.iTop );
00443 
00444 
00445             // build a mask
00446             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gAutoBandageRegion, 0,0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
00447                                      CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
00448 
00449             gfBeginningAutoBandage = TRUE;
00450 
00451       }
00452       else
00453       {
00454             gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode = FALSE;
00455             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags                          &= ( ~OUR_MERCS_AUTO_MOVE );
00456 
00457             // make sure anyone under AI control has their action cancelled
00458             cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID;
00459             for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
00460             {
00461                   if ( pSoldier->bActive  )
00462                   {
00463                         ActionDone( pSoldier );
00464                         if ( pSoldier->bSlotItemTakenFrom != NO_SLOT )
00465                         {
00466                               // swap our old hand item back to the main hand
00467                               SwapObjs( &( pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ), &( pSoldier->inv[ pSoldier->bSlotItemTakenFrom ] ) );
00468                         }
00469 
00470                         // ATE: Mkae everyone stand up!
00471                         if ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && !pSoldier->bCollapsed )
00472                         {
00473                               if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight != ANIM_STAND )
00474                               {
00475                                     ChangeSoldierStance( pSoldier, ANIM_STAND );
00476                               }
00477                         }
00478 
00479                   }
00480             }
00481 
00482 
00483             ubLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
00484             for ( ; ubLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; ubLoop++)
00485             {
00486                   ActionDone( MercPtrs[ ubLoop ] );
00487 
00488                   // If anyone is still doing aid animation, stop!
00489                   if ( MercPtrs[ ubLoop ]->usAnimState == GIVING_AID )
00490                   {
00491                         SoldierGotoStationaryStance( MercPtrs[ ubLoop ] );
00492                   }
00493             }
00494 
00495             // UnLock UI!
00496             guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
00497             HandleTacticalUI( );
00498 
00499             UnPauseGame();
00500             // Bring time back...
00501             //SetGameTimeCompressionLevel( TIME_COMPRESS_X1 );
00502 
00503             //Warp game time by the amount of time it took to autobandage.
00504             WarpGameTime( guiAutoBandageSeconds, WARPTIME_NO_PROCESSING_OF_EVENTS );
00505 
00506             DestroyTerminateAutoBandageButton( );
00507 
00508             // Delete popup!
00509             RemoveMercPopupBoxFromIndex( giBoxId );
00510             giBoxId = -1;
00511             ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_RED, MSG_DEBUG, L"End auto bandage." ); 
00512             
00513             // build a mask
00514             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gAutoBandageRegion );
00515 
00516             // clear faces for auto bandage
00517             RemoveFacesForAutoBandage( );
00518 
00519             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00520             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
00521 
00522             if( gfAutoBandageFailed )
00523             {
00524                   // inform player some mercs could not be bandaged
00525                   DoScreenIndependantMessageBox(pDoctorWarningString[ 1 ], MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00526                   gfAutoBandageFailed = FALSE;
00527             }
00528       }
00529       guiAutoBandageSeconds = 0;
00530 
00531       ResetAllMercSpeeds( );
00532 }
00533

00535 void BeginAutoBandageCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
00536 {
00537   if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
00538       {
00539             fRestoreBackgroundForMessageBox = TRUE;
00540             AutoBandage( TRUE );
00541       }
00542 }

00544 
00545 void SetUpAutoBandageUpdatePanel( void )
00546 {
00547       
00548       INT32 iNumberDoctoring = 0;
00549       INT32 iNumberPatienting = 0;
00550       INT32 iNumberOnTeam = 0;
00551       INT32 iCounterA = 0;
00552 
00553       // reset the tables of merc ids
00554       memset( iDoctorList, -1,  sizeof( INT32 ) * MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT );
00555       memset( iPatientList, -1,  sizeof( INT32 ) * MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT );
00556 
00557 
00558       // grab number of potential grunts on players team
00559       iNumberOnTeam = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID;
00560 
00561       // run through mercs on squad...if they can doctor, add to list
00562       for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < iNumberOnTeam; iCounterA++ )
00563       {
00564             if( CanCharacterAutoBandageTeammate( &Menptr[ iCounterA ] ) )
00565             {
00566                   // add to list, up the count
00567                   iDoctorList[ iNumberDoctoring ] = iCounterA;
00568                   iNumberDoctoring++;
00569                   
00570             }
00571       }
00572 
00573       // run through mercs on squad, if they can patient, add to list
00574       for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < iNumberOnTeam; iCounterA++ )
00575       {
00576             if( CanCharacterBeAutoBandagedByTeammate( &Menptr[ iCounterA ] ) )
00577             {
00578                   // add to list, up the count
00579                   iPatientList[ iNumberPatienting ] = iCounterA;
00580                   iNumberPatienting++;
00581             }
00582       }
00583 
00584       // makes sure there is someone to doctor and patient...
00585       if( ( iNumberDoctoring == 0 ) || ( iNumberPatienting == 0 ) )
00586       {
00587             // reset the tables of merc ids
00588             memset( iDoctorList, -1,  sizeof( INT32 ) * MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT );
00589             memset( iPatientList, -1, sizeof( INT32 ) * MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT );
00590       }
00591 
00592       // now add the faces
00593       AddFacesToAutoBandageBox( );
00594 
00595       fAutoBandageComplete = FALSE;
00596 
00597       return;
00598 }
00599 
00600 void DisplayAutoBandageUpdatePanel( void )
00601 {
00602       INT32 iNumberDoctors = 0, iNumberPatients = 0;
00603       INT32 iNumberDoctorsHigh = 0, iNumberPatientsHigh = 0;
00604       INT32 iNumberDoctorsWide = 0, iNumberPatientsWide = 0;
00605       INT32 iTotalPixelsHigh = 0, iTotalPixelsWide = 0;
00606       INT32 iCurPixelY = 0;
00607       INT16 sXPosition = 0, sYPosition = 0;
00608       HVOBJECT hBackGroundHandle;
00609       INT32 iCounterA = 0, iCounterB = 0;
00610       INT32 iIndex = 0;
00611       INT16 sCurrentXPosition = 0, sCurrentYPosition = 0;
00612       CHAR16 sString[ 64 ];
00613       INT16 sX = 0, sY = 0;
00614 
00615       // are even in autobandage mode?
00616       if( gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode == FALSE )
00617       {
00618             // nope, 
00619             return;
00620       }
00621 
00622       // make sure there is someone to doctor and patient
00623       if( ( iDoctorList[ 0 ] == -1 ) || ( iPatientList[ 0 ] == -1 ) )
00624       {
00625             // nope, nobody here
00626             return;
00627       }
00628 
00629       // grab number of doctors
00630       for( iCounterA = 0; iDoctorList[ iCounterA ] != -1; iCounterA++ )
00631       {
00632             iNumberDoctors++;
00633       }
00634 
00635       // grab number of patients
00636       for( iCounterA = 0; iPatientList[ iCounterA ] != -1; iCounterA++ )
00637       {
00638             iNumberPatients++;
00639       }
00640 
00641       // build dimensions of box
00642       
00643       if( iNumberDoctors < NUMBER_MERC_FACES_AUTOBANDAGE_BOX )
00644       {
00645             // nope, get the base amount
00646             iNumberDoctorsWide = ( iNumberDoctors % NUMBER_MERC_FACES_AUTOBANDAGE_BOX );
00647       }
00648       else
00649       {
00650             iNumberDoctorsWide = NUMBER_MERC_FACES_AUTOBANDAGE_BOX;
00651       }
00652 
00653       
00654             
00655       // set the min number of mercs
00656       if( iNumberDoctorsWide < 3 )
00657       {
00658             iNumberDoctorsWide = 2;
00659       }
00660       else
00661       {
00662             // a full row
00663             iNumberDoctorsWide = NUMBER_MERC_FACES_AUTOBANDAGE_BOX;
00664       }
00665 
00666       // the doctors
00667       iNumberDoctorsHigh = ( iNumberDoctors / ( NUMBER_MERC_FACES_AUTOBANDAGE_BOX ) + 1 );
00668       
00669       if( iNumberDoctors % NUMBER_MERC_FACES_AUTOBANDAGE_BOX )
00670       {
00671             // now the patients
00672             iNumberDoctorsHigh = ( iNumberDoctors / ( NUMBER_MERC_FACES_AUTOBANDAGE_BOX ) + 1 );
00673       }
00674       else
00675       {
00676             // now the patients
00677             iNumberDoctorsHigh = ( iNumberDoctors / ( NUMBER_MERC_FACES_AUTOBANDAGE_BOX )  );
00678       }
00679 
00680       if( iNumberPatients < NUMBER_MERC_FACES_AUTOBANDAGE_BOX )
00681       {
00682             // nope, get the base amount
00683             iNumberPatientsWide = ( iNumberPatients % NUMBER_MERC_FACES_AUTOBANDAGE_BOX );
00684       }
00685       else
00686       {
00687             iNumberPatientsWide = NUMBER_MERC_FACES_AUTOBANDAGE_BOX;
00688       }
00689 
00690       // set the min number of mercs
00691       if( iNumberPatientsWide < 3 )
00692       {
00693             iNumberPatientsWide = 2;
00694       }
00695       else
00696       {
00697             // a full row
00698             iNumberPatientsWide = NUMBER_MERC_FACES_AUTOBANDAGE_BOX;
00699       }
00700 
00701       if( iNumberPatients % NUMBER_MERC_FACES_AUTOBANDAGE_BOX )
00702       {
00703             // now the patients
00704             iNumberPatientsHigh = ( iNumberPatients / ( NUMBER_MERC_FACES_AUTOBANDAGE_BOX ) + 1  );
00705       }
00706       else
00707       {
00708             // now the patients
00709             iNumberPatientsHigh = ( iNumberPatients / ( NUMBER_MERC_FACES_AUTOBANDAGE_BOX )  );
00710       }
00711       
00712 
00713 
00714       // now the actual pixel dimensions
00715       
00716       iTotalPixelsHigh = ( iNumberPatientsHigh + iNumberDoctorsHigh ) * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT;
00717 
00718       // see which is wider, and set to this
00719       if( iNumberDoctorsWide > iNumberPatientsWide )
00720       {
00721             iNumberPatientsWide = iNumberDoctorsWide;
00722       }
00723       else
00724       {
00725             iNumberDoctorsWide = iNumberPatientsWide;
00726       }
00727 
00728       iTotalPixelsWide = TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH * iNumberDoctorsWide;
00729 
00730       // WANNE 2
00731       // now get the x and y position for the box
00732       sXPosition = ( SCREEN_WIDTH - iTotalPixelsWide ) / 2;
00733       sYPosition = ( INV_INTERFACE_START_Y - iTotalPixelsHigh ) / 2;
00734 
00735 
00736       // now blit down the background
00737       GetVideoObject( &hBackGroundHandle, guiUpdatePanelTactical );
00738 
00739 
00740       // first the doctors on top
00741       for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < iNumberDoctorsHigh; iCounterA++ )
00742       {
00743             for( iCounterB = 0; iCounterB < iNumberDoctorsWide; iCounterB ++ )
00744             {
00745                   sCurrentXPosition = sXPosition + ( iCounterB * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH );
00746                   sCurrentYPosition = sYPosition + ( iCounterA * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT );
00747             
00748                   // slap down background piece
00749                   BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 15, sCurrentXPosition, sCurrentYPosition, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00750       
00751 
00752                   iIndex = iCounterA * iNumberDoctorsWide + iCounterB;
00753 
00754                   if( iDoctorList[ iIndex ] != -1 )
00755                   {
00756 
00757                         sCurrentXPosition += TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_OFFSET;
00758                         sCurrentYPosition += TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_Y_OFFSET;
00759                         
00760                         // there is a face
00761                         RenderSoldierSmallFaceForAutoBandagePanel( iIndex, sCurrentXPosition, sCurrentYPosition );
00762                               
00763                         // display the mercs name
00764                         swprintf( sString, L"%s", ( Menptr[ iDoctorList[ iCounterA * iNumberDoctorsWide + iCounterB ] ] ).name );
00765                         FindFontCenterCoordinates( ( INT16 )( sCurrentXPosition ), ( INT16 )( sCurrentYPosition ),  ( TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH - 25 ), 0, sString, TINYFONT1, &sX, &sY );
00766                         SetFont( TINYFONT1 );
00767                         SetFontForeground( FONT_LTRED );
00768                         SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK ); 
00769                         
00770                         sY+= 35;
00771                         sCurrentXPosition -= TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_OFFSET;
00772                         sCurrentYPosition -= TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_Y_OFFSET;
00773 
00774                         // print name
00775                         mprintf( sX, sY , sString );
00776                         //sCurrentYPosition-= TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_Y_OFFSET;
00777                   }
00778             }
00779       }
00780 
00781       for( iCounterB = 0; iCounterB < iNumberPatientsWide; iCounterB ++ )
00782       {
00783                   // slap down background piece
00784                   BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 16, sXPosition + ( iCounterB * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH ), sCurrentYPosition + ( TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT ), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00785                   BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 16, sXPosition + ( iCounterB * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH ), sYPosition - 9 , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00786       
00787                   
00788       }
00789 
00790             // bordering patient title
00791       BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 11, sXPosition - 4, sYPosition + ( ( iNumberDoctorsHigh ) * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT ) , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00792       BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 13, sXPosition + iTotalPixelsWide , sYPosition + ( ( iNumberDoctorsHigh ) * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT ), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00793 
00794 
00795       SetFont( TINYFONT1 );
00796       SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
00797       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK ); 
00798 
00799 //    iCurPixelY = sYPosition;
00800       iCurPixelY = sYPosition + ( ( iCounterA - 1 ) * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT );
00801       
00802 
00803       swprintf( sString, L"%s", zMarksMapScreenText[ 13 ] );
00804       FindFontCenterCoordinates( ( INT16 )( sXPosition ), ( INT16 )( sCurrentYPosition ),  ( INT16 )( iTotalPixelsWide ), 0, sString, TINYFONT1, &sX, &sY );
00805       // print medic
00806       mprintf( sX, sYPosition - 7 , sString );
00807       
00808       //DisplayWrappedString( ( INT16 )( sXPosition ),  ( INT16 )( sCurrentYPosition - 40 ), ( INT16 )( iTotalPixelsWide ), 0, TINYFONT1, FONT_WHITE, pUpdateMercStrings[ 0 ], FONT_BLACK, 0, 0 );
00809 
00810       
00811       sYPosition += 9;
00812 
00813       // now the patients
00814       for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < iNumberPatientsHigh; iCounterA++ )
00815       {
00816             for( iCounterB = 0; iCounterB < iNumberPatientsWide; iCounterB ++ )
00817             {
00818 
00819                   sCurrentXPosition = sXPosition + ( iCounterB * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH );
00820                   sCurrentYPosition = sYPosition + ( ( iCounterA + iNumberDoctorsHigh ) * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT );
00821             
00822                   
00823                   // slap down background piece
00824                   BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 15, sCurrentXPosition,      sCurrentYPosition , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00825 
00826 
00827                   iIndex = iCounterA * iNumberPatientsWide + iCounterB;
00828 
00829                   if( iPatientList[ iIndex ] != -1 )
00830                   {
00831 
00832                         sCurrentXPosition += TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_OFFSET;
00833                         sCurrentYPosition += TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_Y_OFFSET;
00834                         
00835                         // there is a face
00836                         RenderSoldierSmallFaceForAutoBandagePanel( iIndex + iNumberDoctors, sCurrentXPosition, sCurrentYPosition );
00837                               
00838                         // display the mercs name
00839                         swprintf( sString, L"%s", ( Menptr[ iPatientList[ iIndex ] ] ).name );
00840                         FindFontCenterCoordinates( ( INT16 )( sCurrentXPosition ), ( INT16 )( sCurrentYPosition ),  ( TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH - 25 ), 0, sString, TINYFONT1, &sX, &sY );
00841                         SetFont( TINYFONT1 );
00842                         SetFontForeground( FONT_LTRED );
00843                         SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK ); 
00844                         sY+= 35;
00845                         
00846                         // print name
00847                         mprintf( sX, sY , sString );
00848                   }
00849             
00850             }
00851       }
00852       
00853 
00854       // BORDER PIECES!!!!
00855 
00856       // bordering patients squares
00857       for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < iNumberPatientsHigh; iCounterA++ )
00858       {
00859             BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 3, sXPosition - 4, sYPosition + ( ( iCounterA + iNumberDoctorsHigh ) * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT ) , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00860             BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 5, sXPosition + iTotalPixelsWide , sYPosition + ( ( iCounterA  + iNumberDoctorsHigh ) * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT ), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00861       }
00862 
00863 
00864       // back up 11 pixels
00865       sYPosition-=9;
00866 
00867       // pieces bordering doctor squares
00868       for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < iNumberDoctorsHigh; iCounterA++ )
00869       {
00870             BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 3, sXPosition - 4, sYPosition + ( ( iCounterA  ) * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT ) , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00871             BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 5, sXPosition + iTotalPixelsWide , sYPosition + ( ( iCounterA  ) * TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT ), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00872       }
00873 
00874       // bordering doctor title
00875       BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 11, sXPosition - 4, sYPosition - 9, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00876       BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 13, sXPosition + iTotalPixelsWide , sYPosition - 9, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00877 
00878 
00879       // now the top pieces
00880       for( iCounterA = 0; iCounterA < iNumberPatientsWide; iCounterA++ )
00881       {
00882             // the top bottom
00883             BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 1, sXPosition + TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH * (iCounterA ) , sYPosition - 13 , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00884       }
00885 
00886       // the top corners
00887       BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 0, sXPosition -4, sYPosition - 13 , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00888       BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 2, sXPosition + iTotalPixelsWide , sYPosition - 13 , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00889 
00890       iTotalPixelsHigh+= 9;
00891 
00892       // the bottom
00893       BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 17, sXPosition - 4, sYPosition + iTotalPixelsHigh, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00894       BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 18, sXPosition + iTotalPixelsWide - TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH,  sYPosition + iTotalPixelsHigh, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00895 
00896       if( iNumberPatientsWide == 2 )
00897       {
00898             BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 6, sXPosition - 4, sYPosition + iTotalPixelsHigh, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00899             CreateTerminateAutoBandageButton( ( INT16)( sXPosition ), ( INT16 )( sYPosition + iTotalPixelsHigh + 3) );
00900       }
00901       else
00902       {
00903             BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hBackGroundHandle, 6, sXPosition + TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH - 4, sYPosition + iTotalPixelsHigh, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00904             CreateTerminateAutoBandageButton( ( INT16 )( sXPosition + TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_WIDTH), ( INT16 )( sYPosition + iTotalPixelsHigh + 3) );
00905       }
00906 
00907       SetFont( TINYFONT1 );
00908       SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
00909       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK ); 
00910 
00911       swprintf( sString, L"%s", zMarksMapScreenText[ 14 ]);
00912       FindFontCenterCoordinates( ( INT16 )( sXPosition ), ( INT16 )( sCurrentYPosition ),  ( INT16 )( iTotalPixelsWide ), 0, sString, TINYFONT1, &sX, &sY );      
00913       // print patient
00914       mprintf( sX, iCurPixelY + ( TACT_UPDATE_MERC_FACE_X_HEIGHT ) + 2, sString );
00915                   
00916 
00917       MarkAButtonDirty( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 0 ] );
00918       MarkAButtonDirty( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 1 ] );
00919 
00920 
00921       
00922 
00923       DrawButton( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 0 ] );
00924       DrawButton( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 1 ] );
00925       
00926       iTotalPixelsHigh+= 35;
00927 
00928       // if autobandage is complete, set the fact by enabling the done button
00929       if( fAutoBandageComplete == FALSE )
00930       {
00931             DisableButton( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 0 ]);
00932             EnableButton( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 1 ] );
00933       }
00934       else
00935       {
00936             DisableButton( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 1 ]);
00937             EnableButton( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 0 ] );
00938       }
00939 
00940       // now make sure it goes to the screen
00941       InvalidateRegion( sXPosition - 4, sYPosition - 18, ( INT16 )( sXPosition + iTotalPixelsWide + 4), ( INT16 )( sYPosition + iTotalPixelsHigh  ) );
00942 
00943       return;
00944 }
00945 
00946 
00947 
00948 void CreateTerminateAutoBandageButton( INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
00949 {
00950       // create the kill autobandage button
00951       if( fAutoEndBandageButtonCreated )
00952       {
00953             // button created, leave
00954             return;
00955       }
00956 
00957       fAutoEndBandageButtonCreated = TRUE;
00958 
00959       // the continue button
00960 
00961       // grab the image
00962       iEndAutoBandageButtonImage[ 0 ] = LoadButtonImage( "INTERFACE\\group_confirm_tactical.sti" ,-1,7,-1,8,-1 );
00963       
00964       // grab the button      
00965       iEndAutoBandageButton[ 0 ] = QuickCreateButton( iEndAutoBandageButtonImage[ 0 ], sX, sY, 
00966                                                                                     BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
00967                                                                                     (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)StopAutoBandageButtonCallback );
00968 
00969 
00970       //the cancel button
00971       // grab the image
00972       iEndAutoBandageButtonImage[ 1 ] = LoadButtonImage( "INTERFACE\\group_confirm_tactical.sti" ,-1,7,-1,8,-1 );
00973       
00974       // grab the button      
00975       iEndAutoBandageButton[ 1 ] = QuickCreateButton( iEndAutoBandageButtonImage[ 1 ], ( INT16 )( sX + 70 ) , sY, 
00976                                                                                     BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
00977                                                                                     (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)StopAutoBandageButtonCallback );
00978 
00979       SpecifyButtonText( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 0 ], zMarksMapScreenText[ 15 ] );
00980       SpecifyButtonFont( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 0 ], MAP_SCREEN_FONT );
00981       SpecifyButtonUpTextColors( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 0 ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FONT_BLACK );
00982       SpecifyButtonDownTextColors( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 0 ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FONT_BLACK );
00983 
00984       SpecifyButtonText( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 1 ], zMarksMapScreenText[ 16 ] );
00985       SpecifyButtonFont( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 1 ], MAP_SCREEN_FONT );
00986       SpecifyButtonUpTextColors( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 1 ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FONT_BLACK );
00987       SpecifyButtonDownTextColors( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 1 ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FONT_BLACK );
00988 
00989       return;
00990 }
00991 
00992 
00993 void StopAutoBandageButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00994 {
00995       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00996       {
00997         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
00998       }
00999       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01000   {
01001     if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
01002             {
01003       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01004               fEndAutoBandage = TRUE;
01005             }
01006       }
01007 
01008       return;
01009 }
01010 
01011 
01012 
01013 void DestroyTerminateAutoBandageButton( void )
01014 {
01015 
01016       // destroy the kill autobandage button
01017       if( fAutoEndBandageButtonCreated == FALSE )
01018       {
01019             // not around, don't destroy what ain't there
01020             return;
01021       }
01022       
01023       fAutoEndBandageButtonCreated = FALSE;
01024 
01025       // remove button
01026       RemoveButton( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 0 ] );
01027       RemoveButton( iEndAutoBandageButton[ 1 ] );
01028 
01029       // unload image
01030       UnloadButtonImage( iEndAutoBandageButtonImage[ 0 ] );
01031       UnloadButtonImage( iEndAutoBandageButtonImage[ 1 ] );
01032 
01033       return;
01034 }
01035 
01036 
01037 
01038 
01039 BOOLEAN AddFacesToAutoBandageBox( void )
01040 {
01041       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01042       INT32 iNumberOfDoctors = 0;
01043       VOBJECT_DESC     VObjectDesc;
01044 
01045 
01046       // reset
01047       memset( &giAutoBandagesSoldierFaces, -1, 2 * MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT );
01048 
01049       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
01050 
01051       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
01052       {
01053             // find a free slot
01054             if( iDoctorList[ iCounter ] != -1 )
01055             {
01056                   if( gMercProfiles[ ( Menptr[ iDoctorList[ iCounter ] ] ).ubProfile ].ubFaceIndex < 100 )
01057                   {
01058                         // grab filename of face
01059                         sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Faces\\65Face\\%02d.sti", gMercProfiles[ ( Menptr[ iDoctorList[ iCounter ] ] ).ubProfile ].ubFaceIndex );
01060                   }
01061                   else
01062                   {
01063                         // grab filename of face
01064                         sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Faces\\65Face\\%03d.sti", gMercProfiles[ ( Menptr[ iDoctorList[ iCounter ] ] ).ubProfile ].ubFaceIndex );
01065                   }
01066 
01067                   // load the face
01068                   AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, (UINT32 *)&giAutoBandagesSoldierFaces[ iCounter ] );
01069                   iNumberOfDoctors++;
01070                   
01071             }
01072       }
01073 
01074       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
01075       {
01076             // find a free slot
01077             if( iPatientList[ iCounter ] != -1 )
01078             {
01079                   if( gMercProfiles[ ( Menptr[ iPatientList[ iCounter ] ] ).ubProfile ].ubFaceIndex < 100 )
01080                   {
01081                         // grab filename of face
01082                         sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Faces\\65Face\\%02d.sti", gMercProfiles[ ( Menptr[ iPatientList[ iCounter ] ] ).ubProfile ].ubFaceIndex );
01083                   }
01084                   else
01085                   {
01086                         // grab filename of face
01087                         sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Faces\\65Face\\%03d.sti", gMercProfiles[ ( Menptr[ iPatientList[ iCounter ] ] ).ubProfile ].ubFaceIndex );
01088                   }
01089 
01090                   // load the face
01091                   AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, (UINT32 *)&giAutoBandagesSoldierFaces[ iCounter + iNumberOfDoctors ] );
01092 
01093             }
01094       }
01095 
01096             // grab panels
01097       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
01098       sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Interface\\panels.sti" );
01099       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, (UINT32 *)&giMercPanelImage ) )
01100       {
01101             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load Interface\\panels.sti" );
01102       }
01103 
01104       return( TRUE );
01105 }
01106 
01107 BOOLEAN RemoveFacesForAutoBandage( void )
01108 {
01109       INT32 iCounter = 0, iNumberOfDoctors = 0;
01110 
01111 
01112       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
01113       {
01114             // find a free slot
01115             if( iDoctorList[ iCounter ] != -1 )
01116             {
01117                   // load the face
01118                   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( giAutoBandagesSoldierFaces[ iCounter ] );
01119                   iNumberOfDoctors++;
01120             }
01121       }
01122 
01123 
01124       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
01125       {
01126             // find a free slot
01127             if( iPatientList[ iCounter ] != -1 )
01128             {
01129                   // load the face
01130                   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( giAutoBandagesSoldierFaces[ iCounter + iNumberOfDoctors ] );
01131             }
01132       }
01133 
01134       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( giMercPanelImage );
01135 
01136       return( TRUE );
01137 }
01138 
01139 BOOLEAN RenderSoldierSmallFaceForAutoBandagePanel( INT32 iIndex, INT16 sCurrentXPosition, INT16 sCurrentYPosition )
01140 {
01141 
01142       INT32 iStartY = 0;
01143       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
01144       INT32 iCounter = 0, iIndexCount = 0;
01145       HVOBJECT hHandle;
01146 
01147       // grab the video object
01148       GetVideoObject( &hHandle, giAutoBandagesSoldierFaces[ iIndex ] );
01149 
01150       // fill the background for the info bars black
01151       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, sCurrentXPosition+36, sCurrentYPosition+2, sCurrentXPosition+44,   sCurrentYPosition+30, 0 );
01152       
01153       // put down the background
01154       BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, giMercPanelImage, 0, sCurrentXPosition, sCurrentYPosition, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01155       
01156       // grab the face
01157       BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER , hHandle , 0, sCurrentXPosition+2, sCurrentYPosition+2, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01158       
01159 
01160       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_CHARACTER_COUNT; iCounter++ )
01161       {
01162             // find a free slot
01163             if( iDoctorList[ iCounter ] != -1 )
01164             {
01165                   iIndexCount++;
01166             }
01167       }
01168 
01169       // see if we are looking into doctor or patient lists?
01170       if( iIndexCount > iIndex )
01171       {
01172             //HEALTH BAR
01173             pSoldier = &Menptr[ iDoctorList[ iIndex ] ];
01174       }
01175       else
01176       {
01177             //HEALTH BAR
01178             pSoldier = &Menptr[ iPatientList[ iIndex - iIndexCount ] ];
01179       }
01180 
01181       // is the merc alive?
01182       if( !pSoldier->bLife )
01183             return( FALSE );
01184 
01185 
01186       //yellow one for bleeding
01187       iStartY = sCurrentYPosition + 29 - 27*pSoldier->bLifeMax/100;
01188       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, sCurrentXPosition+36, iStartY, sCurrentXPosition+37, sCurrentYPosition+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 107, 107, 57 ) ) );
01189       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, sCurrentXPosition+37, iStartY, sCurrentXPosition+38, sCurrentYPosition+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 222, 181, 115 ) ) );
01190       
01191       //pink one for bandaged.
01192       iStartY += 27*pSoldier->bBleeding/100;
01193       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, sCurrentXPosition+36, iStartY, sCurrentXPosition+37, sCurrentYPosition+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 156, 57, 57 ) ) );
01194       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, sCurrentXPosition+37, iStartY, sCurrentXPosition+38, sCurrentYPosition+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 222, 132, 132 ) ) );
01195       
01196       //red one for actual health
01197       iStartY = sCurrentYPosition + 29 - 27*pSoldier->bLife/100;
01198       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, sCurrentXPosition+36, iStartY, sCurrentXPosition+37, sCurrentYPosition+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 107, 8, 8 ) ) );
01199       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, sCurrentXPosition+37, iStartY, sCurrentXPosition+38, sCurrentYPosition+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 206, 0, 0 ) ) );
01200       
01201       //BREATH BAR
01202       iStartY = sCurrentYPosition + 29 - 27*pSoldier->bBreathMax/100;
01203       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, sCurrentXPosition+39, iStartY, sCurrentXPosition+40, sCurrentYPosition+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 8, 8, 132 ) ) );
01204       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, sCurrentXPosition+40, iStartY, sCurrentXPosition+41, sCurrentYPosition+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 8, 8, 107 ) ) );
01205       
01206       //MORALE BAR
01207       iStartY = sCurrentYPosition + 29 - 27*pSoldier->bMorale/100;
01208       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, sCurrentXPosition+42, iStartY, sCurrentXPosition+43, sCurrentYPosition+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 8, 156, 8 ) ) );
01209       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, sCurrentXPosition+43, iStartY, sCurrentXPosition+44, sCurrentYPosition+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 8, 107, 8 ) ) );
01210 
01211       return( TRUE );
01212 }
